verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: By Mohammed Tawfeeq , Samantha] Beech and Angela Dewan , CNN [ARG0: Russian President Vladimir Putin] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Sunday] [ARG1: he was ready for a face - to - face meeting with US President Donald Trump over the dangers of a new arms race] .

By Mohammed Tawfeeq , Samantha Beech and Angela Dewan , CNN Russian President Vladimir Putin said Sunday [ARG1: he] [V: was] [ARG2: ready for a face - to - face meeting with US President Donald Trump over the dangers of a new arms race] .
